main event: A UFO was observed in Trotwood, Ohio, on April 11, 1967, appearing as a bright star that turned red and faded out of sight.
interesting points: The object was observed for a total duration of 3 hours.,It changed colors and appeared to disappear and reappear.,The object was not considered to be a satellite or man-made but seemed more like a natural phenomenon.,Witness description includes a detailed questionnaire about the sighting.,The case was investigated by the U.S. Air Force under Project Blue Book.
sighted object: a bright star-like object that turned red
witness description: The witness was 19 years old and provided detailed observations about the object's behavior.
